about.title: Laureano Iglesias
about.subtitle: +1 year of experience in startups. Full Stack developer with strong Front-End skills. Ability to adapt in dynamic environments, ease and efficiency in working in teams, and willingness to learn.

content.title: Full Stack developer
tasks: I created features that optimised the UX of the app using Javascript and Ruby on Rails
I performed regression testing and QA
I provided technical support to users of the app, gave guidance on its use and diagnosed bugs, giving them solutions on the day or in future sprints depending on their criticality

content.title: Full Stack developer
tasks: I implemented the use of an api that uses AI to transcribe audio to text
I created a component that performs drag and drop of elements in a very specific way for usability testing
Based on figma wireframes, I diagrammed and implemented the necessary test builder for the app
I optimised the use of the database (Firestore) for constant data storage and reduced costs

content.title: Typing Game
content.description: Simply game with only Vanilla JS, to improve logical thinking and typing speed. Stack: HTML, CSS, JS

content.title: World-app
content.description: CRUD with countries-API, displays basic stats and activities. Filtering, sorting, searching, and creation of new activities. Stack: PERN

content.title: Ecommerce-videogames
content.description: Ecommerce with authentication, local/Google registration, guest mode, shopping cart, Mercado Pago Checkout/PayPal, admin dashboard for user management, bans, sales, and comments, along with mailing system. Stack: Node.js, Express, Auth0, NodeMailer, React, Redux, Bootstrap, Postgres
